attributes.action: Make Russel Brand an Option to be the new Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
So far we have been lied to and A lot of the U.K. Has lost conidence in the decisions the government has made.
We would like to personally choose our leader.
attributes.background:
As David Cameron has stepped down, we as a nation believe Russel Brand is the Only man for the job.

Even the option for a public vote including Candidates Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbin and Russel Brand

rejection.details: In any case, Mr Brand would make any decision about whether or not he stood for office and, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
